extendedInfo.description: â Features:1. First 3 COC entries are customizable - select one and then press "Edit Camera" from the menu.2. Tab for showing the DOF calculations for the range of apertures3. Tab for showing the DOF calculations for the range of focal lengths4. Tab for showing the DOF calculations for the range of subject distances5. Tab for showing the FOV for the range of focal lengthsâ Calculates:1. Depth of field2. Hyperfocal distance3. Near and far limits4. DOF in front and behind subject5. Rectilinear angle of view for the chosen camera and focal lengthâ Inputs for (press and drag left and right to scroll the values):1. Units (meters, feet, centimeters and inches - swipe the top panel left and right on the first tab to switch units)2. f-stop3. Focal Length4. Subject Distance (long press selected value when units is meters/feet to input additional centimeters/inches)5. Teleconverter (1.4x, 1.5x, 1.6x, 1.7x, 2.0x, 3.0x)â Settings for:1. Showing custom COC Values only2. Hiding the teleconverter input3. f-stop increments, f-stop range start and end4. Adjusting maximum subject distanceâ Found a problem?  Please email for support. ââ If you run into a crash please email with details, thanks!!! â

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful, it is direct to the point, very comprehensive info and it has many camera/sensor settings; it was no problem finding my cropped sensor.  Many other apps I have tried haven\'t so many sensor options hence are less accurate when calculating. Compliments.
reviews.author: Andy Andy

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.comment: Had to setup my Nikon 1 v2 but easy to do. No frills -- easy to use -- many thanks
reviews.author: Bob high

reviews.title: Amazing, Simple, Rich of Info, (HTC One)
reviews.comment: Developed in accordance with technical needs. No fancy stuffs. The UI is easy to use, each tab is providing comprehensive info. Compliments.
reviews.author: Ladislav Pechal

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Intuitive interface and does exactly what it should do.

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST DOF CALCULATOR
reviews.comment: I\'ve downloaded and used many DOF calculators over the past few years and this is, without a doubt, the best one I\'ve come across.

reviews.title: Clean and useful - just what I was looking for
reviews.comment: A nice field useable application. No snooping permissions required. Good job! Thanks for letting the user write in their own sensor size and circle of confusion values.
reviews.author: brad s

reviews.title: Great UI
reviews.comment: Developed with great attention in detail for best user experience. The UI is smooth and easy to use.
reviews.author: Dino Zarafonitis

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Functional, smooth and accurate. Developer knows his stuff and updates and improves his app regularly.   A must for any manual professional photographer or even a student who is smart enough to start and learn old school.  Simply well done.
reviews.author: Don Ashcraft

reviews.title: smooth UI, information-rich
reviews.comment: Well-designed application with a smooth UI. For most apps, tabs of screens of tables of numbers would be a bad UI, but this is the proverbial exception. Focus limits, depth of field, hyperfocal distance, and field of view are easily available and managed by swipes on the main tab, and settings control the steps and range for the input controls. The other tabs let you see the effect of changes (aperature, focal length, subject distances) at a glance.
reviews.author: Michael K Johnson

reviews.title: What happend - update fest?
reviews.comment: Why updeat almost every day?
reviews.author: Marko Kalmus

reviews.comment: Great piece of software. Recommend..

reviews.title: Best dof calc out
reviews.comment: Best looking, easiest to use, most info and contrary to other users comments you can set your own COC and sensor size. Brilliant.

reviews.comment: This program is no nonsense. It does not require any permission to run,  and does exactly what iy intends to do. Perfect, simple.

reviews.comment: This app seems easiest to \"browse\" results to quickly see what changing aperture will do for your current subject.  Nexus 4
